name: NOSNOW MAN
description:
My entry for MiniJam 42 "NOSNOW MAN". This was my first ever game jam so i was really exited for it. And since i been only learning unity for a month , this jam gave me a challenge which helped me learn a lot and improve. Anyways i am eager to know your feedback so that i can learn the mistakes and improve further.

In this fun little top down shooter you destroy evil snowman with you guessed it "snowballs".Try to get a highscore and collect pickups to keep the play going
